game.name: PAYDAY 2: Federales Weapon Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Federales Weapon Pack DLC includes three new pistols, all of which are capable of full auto fire. Each of these weapons also has an akimbo option. 10 new weapon mods are also included.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Federales Weapon Pack DLC includes three new pistols, all of which are capable of full auto fire. Each of these weapons also has an akimbo option. 10 new weapon mods are also included.
